member.name: T:Vortice.Vulkan.Vulkan
member.summary: Provides Vulkan specific constants for special values, layer names and extension names.

member.name: M:Vortice.Vulkan.Vulkan.vkEnumerateInstanceExtensionProperties(System.String)
member.summary: Returns up to requested number of global extension properties
member.param: Is either null/empty or a string naming the layer to retrieve extensions from.

member.name: M:Vortice.Vulkan.Vulkan.vkEnumerateDeviceExtensionProperties(Vortice.Vulkan.VkPhysicalDevice,System.String)
member.summary: Returns properties of available physical device extensions
member.param: Is either null/empty or a string naming the layer to retrieve extensions from.

member.name: M:Vortice.Vulkan.Vulkan.vkEnumerateInstanceVersion
member.summary: Query instance-level version before instance creation.
member.returns: The version of Vulkan supported by instance-level functionality.

member.name: T:Vortice.Vulkan.VkPointerSize
member.summary:
A platform-specific type that is used to represent a size (in bytes) of an object in memory.
Equivalent to C/C++ size_t type.
